title: Database Creation
text: SQL execution is not directly related to database creation.

title: Best Study Methods for Learning SQL
text: Reading may broaden your perspective but may not improve your competence in SQL. On the other hand, going into detail into a case study may be useful for identifying problem areas, but it may not help with resolving them.

title: Constructing Queries.
text: The best way to learn specific SQL syntax is to type it out for various question types.
